value.fullName: Yes, I typically stay up until after 11:00pm and/or am comfortable living with someone who does.
value.label: Yes, I typically stay up until after 11:00pm and/or am comfortable living with someone who does.

value.fullName: No, I go to bed before 11:00pm and prefer to live with someone who also goes to bed before 11:00pm.
